title: What Is a Budget?
description: A budget is a plan for how you'll use your money - giving every dollar a job before you spend it.

title: The 50/30/20 Rule
description: Allocate 50% to needs, 30% to wants, and 20% to savings and debt. A common starting point.

title: Understanding Credit Scores
description: Learn how your credit score is calculated and how it affects loans, rent, opportunies, and more.

title: What To Do If You're in Debt
description: There's no shame in debt. This guide helps you organize, prioritize, and make a plan.

title: How to Start an Emergency Fund
description: An emergency fund is savings for unexpected expenses such as: medical bills, car repair, pet care, or job loss.

title: Financial Abuse: What It Is and How to Get Help
description: Recognize the signs of financial control and find supportive resources for reclaiming autonomy.

title: Understanding Subscriptions and Auto-Renewals
description: Learn how recurring costs sneak up and how to audit, cancel, or pause services that no longer serve you.

title: Emotional Spending & Mood Triggers
description: A guide to the link between emotions, spending patterns, and how mindfulness can protect your wallet.

title: Setting Realistic Savings Goals
description: Learn to break down big dreams and goals into achievable milestones. Studies show that if you start with one small habit, momentum will follow.

title: How to Track and Cut Everyday Expenses
description: Practical methods to identify leaks in your spending habits and reclaim control of your daily cash flow.

title: Managing Financial Fatigue
description: Tips on how to manage the very real problem of financial burnout. It's okay to rest without giving up on your goals.

title: Healthy Relatonship With Money
description: Our upbringing and beliefs shape our financial behavior. Learn way to rewrite your money story.

title: Understanding Needs vs Wants
description: Just because we want something, doesn't automatically mean we need it. Distinguish essentials from extras to spend more consciously without deprivation

title: How to Negotiate Bills and Rates
description: Learn simple reusable scripts and tactics while speaking with creditors to reduce monthly bills on phone, internet, or insurance.

title: Financial Planning for Neurodivergent Minds
description: Strategies for autism, ADHD, and sensory-friendly finance routines that actually work with your brain, not against it.

title: Building Credit Safely
description: Learn safe ways to build or rebuild credit without falling into high-interest traps.
